name: d3-hypergraph
author: Andrea Simeone
description: {Implement the hypergraph linking into the D3 force layout}

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-hypergraph.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-hypergraph.js -c -m -o build/d3-hypergraph.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-hypergraph.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-hypergraph.js build/d3-hypergraph.min.js
